distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for SDL2 fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2020-14409, CVE-2020-14410: Fixed overflow in surface pitch calculation (bsc#1181201, bsc#1181202).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: SDL (Simple DirectMedia Layer) through 2.0.12 has an Integer Overflow (and resultant SDL_memcpy heap corruption) in SDL_BlitCopy in video/SDL_blit_copy.c via a crafted .BMP file.
notes.title: Vulnerability description

notes.text: SDL (Simple DirectMedia Layer) through 2.0.12 has a heap-based buffer over-read in Blit_3or4_to_3or4__inversed_rgb in video/SDL_blit_N.c via a crafted .BMP file.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
